title: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere
content:
Gate 3. Otiluke's Freezing Sphere is a Lvl 6 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Characters or interact with the environment.

BG3 Otiluke's Freezing Sphere Information

Description: Create a ball of churning ice that can be launched instantly to generate a frosty explosion or stored for later use. Level: Lvl 6 spell School: Evocation School Casting Time: Action Range: Melee Requires Concentration: No Saving Throw: CON
